Package edu.cnm.deepdive.nnmhlserver.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.nnmhlserver.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter<Jwt,UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken>
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements Converter<Jwt,UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken>
Provides high level persistence and business logic for User entity.
